name: Goat Battles
description:
Two rival goat tribes find themselves facing off in an intense battle. Headbutt your way to victory!

Goat Battles is a simple strategy game for 2 players. Each player takes turns in moving their goats over a cliffy landscape and ram the opposing goats into non-existence.

Ram out all your opponents goats and win the battle!

How to play

Decide who goes first.

Each player controls four goats that are distributed on random starting positions over the randomized playing field that consists of an 8x8 grid with three different height levels. All goats start on level one.

Each turn you go through this process:

Moving

  • Distribute three moves over one or more of your goats.
  • One move means moving your goat one square forwards, backwards, left or right not diagonally.
  • You can only move one level up or down with each move.

Goat Battle

  • After moving, each of your goats that stands next to an enemy goat will attack that enemy goat.
  • They both have to be on the same level or one level up or down,
  • You normally have a 30% success rate with each attack.
  • The success rate is 50% if you stand on a higher level than the enemy goat.

Resolution

  • If an attack was successful the attacked goat is removed from play.
  • If it was unsuccessful then nothing happens.

Then it's the opponents turn and the process above is repeated until one player succeeds in removing all enemy goats from play.

That's it!
